title: Detoxification Therapy
cleaned_text: - Anti-Aging Detoxification removes [free radicals](https://www.medicalnewstoday.com/articles/318652) and heavy metals. This helps improve nutrient absorption enabling your body to heal itself and fight oxidative stress, which cause premature aging. - Improve Balance The body is comprised of many different systems that must work conjunctively for optimal health. Whenever these systems do not function properly, illness can occur. Toxins and unhealthy eating habits can cause the body to become improperly balanced. Detoxification helps to heal the [digestive](https://rosewellness.com/gastrointestinal-disease-gut-health/), [hormonal](https://rosewellness.com/hormonal-imbalance-treatment-hrt/) and nervous systems. - Increased Energy Detoxification helps to restore emotional energy, mental energy and physical energy. Many people, who regularly detox, find they sleep better and wake up energized. - Boost Immunity A healthy immune system helps prevent illnesses such as common cold or flu. A healthy gastrointestinal tract contains both good and bad bacteria. Detoxification can help increase immunity by purging bad bacteria and increase the amount of good bacteria.
